name: Kale-Wrapped Dates with Almonds
author: jcschlan
summary: A friend introduced me to this recipe, and because it's both simple and delicious, it received the the rare honor of being committed to memory. It is a sweet and savory appetizer, and I've yet to meet anyone who didn't enjoy it.
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and discarded
directions: Tear each kale leaf into two halves
Split the dates in half, removing the pit
Place an almond in each date half in the space left by the pit
Wrap each date half in a kale leaf half; pierce each with a toothpick to keep wrapped
